block_comment: This block of Verilog code controls a FIFO memory unit. Upon a rising edge of the clock or a falling edge of the reset signal, the state of "fifo_9" is updated. If the reset signal is '0', the memory unit is reset and "fifo_9" is set to '0'. Otherwise, if 'fifo_9_enable' is high, "fifo_9" takes the value of "fifo_9_mux".
